title: T205 American Beauty backs Wheat and Evans
author: Republicaninmass

posts.post_title: T205 American Beauty backs Wheat and Evans
posts.post_content:
AB's dont show up very often, and are pretty much mirrored with the pops of the Broadleafs



Evans, pretty sharp, but slight paperloss on top reverse  





Wheat light wrinkle on front, otherwise nice!
Compared to what the AB's just sold for in LOTG you are asking for the moon.

Feel free to PM offers 

Rather than pissing in my thread


Thanks in advance
